questiontext.text:
Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-8 &-10 &2 \\-1 &-3 &-2 \\8 &1 &9\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-9.0728:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-3.3437:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=10.4165:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}4 &-2 &-2 \\5 &-2 &-8 \\8 &-5 &-10\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-11.8026:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=1.0444:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=2.7582:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-1 &-8 &1 \\-7 &-10 &-1 \\-2 &-3 &-10\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-14.5595:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-9.6343:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=3.1938:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-9 &-10 &-3 \\-7 &6 &-2 \\-1 &2 &-4\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-12.8323:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-3.7669:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=9.5991:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-3 &-9 &-9 \\-5 &-7 &-9 \\-7 &-9 &-2\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-20:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=2:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=6:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}1 &-7 &-8 \\-8 &7 &-5 \\-7 &-7 &-9\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-16.4245:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=3.4533:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=11.9712:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-5 &4 &-3 \\8 &-10 &3 \\-10 &-2 &8\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-2.4921:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-14.1835:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=9.6756:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-2 &-6 &-10 \\-8 &-1 &4 \\-7 &-6 &-8\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-15.1489:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-1:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=5.1489:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-4 &-1 &-8 \\3 &5 &-1 \\-8 &-8 &1\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-9.1132:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=1.3616:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=9.7517:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-5 &-10 &-8 \\-4 &-6 &3 \\-10 &-9 &-10\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-16.4565:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-8.0103:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=3.4668:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-7 &10 &-8 \\5 &9 &1 \\-5 &-8 &-5\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-12.6401:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-2.6887:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=12.3288:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}1 &-1 &-6 \\9 &2 &3 \\-4 &-3 &-6\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-3.2645:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-4.4671:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=4.7316:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-3 &-3 &-7 \\2 &-1 &-1 \\-3 &-4 &-10\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-1.2621:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-12.0821:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-0.65577:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-1 &-9 &-6 \\-1 &10 &-1 \\-3 &-6 &10\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-3.4389:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=9.9117:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=12.5273:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-8 &-10 &4 \\6 &-9 &-9 \\-8 &-10 &5\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant figures and answer in increasing order $$\small\lambda_{1}\leq\lambda_{2}\leq\lambda_{3}$$]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-3.3166:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-12:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{3} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=3.3166:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}
